node.title: Product Adoption Specialist
node.excerpt: As Traefik Labs product adoption specialist you will monitor our user community and engage to support the use of our products.
node.custom_excerpt: As Traefik Labs product adoption specialist you will monitor our user community and engage to support the use of our products.
node.plaintext:
Worldwide Full Time Engineering The Position

As Traefik Labs product adoption specialist you will monitor our user community
and engage to support the use of our products. In this technical role, you will
act as a moderator for all public forums to ensure that no question remains
unanswered.  Day to day activities will revolve around answering posts on
different channels, animating Traefik Proxy forum and guiding users through
their trial experience as needed.  This broad exposure to the diverse
communities will be your opportunity to ensure Traefik Labs has the right
mindshare across the board.

Requirements

 * Analytical and critical thinking
 * Good Technical writer abilities
 * Open source software advocate
 * Experience with Cloud Native technologies.
 * Comfortable coding and hacking on Docker and Kubernetes in an enterprise
   environment.
 * Comfortable in a remote work culture using the tools associated with such a
   culture.

Responsibilities

 * Monitoring of Traefik Labs’ Forum and other community forums like Github,
   stack overflow, etc.
 * Educating, documenting, demonstrating
 * Capture FAQ and translate to Knowledge Base articles as appropriate
 * Respond to Trial slack channel inquiries
 * Provide structured feedback to Product Management to guide product evolution
 * Support our user group through regular office hours and community slack
   channels & forum
 * Actively participate in customer onboarding and other Customers’ Tech Support
   activities

The Location

This position is remote friendly with occasional travel to offices and/or shows
as needed.

node.title: Technical Writer
node.excerpt: Data Centers around the world are experiencing a massive evolution, driven by containers, microservices, and cloud-native architectures. At Traefik Labs, we develop advanced software solutions for modern data centers.
node.custom_excerpt: Data Centers around the world are experiencing a massive evolution, driven by containers, microservices, and cloud-native architectures. At Traefik Labs, we develop advanced software solutions for modern data centers.
node.plaintext:
Worldwide Full Time Engineering Data Centers around the world are experiencing
a massive evolution, driven by containers, microservices, and cloud-native
architectures. At Traefik Labs, we develop advanced software solutions for
modern data centers. Our first product, Traefik, is being adopted at an
exceptional rate: more than 25000+ stars on Github, 1+ billion downloads on
DockerHub, and in production in thousands of data centers: it has become a
recognized market leader less than two years after launch. We believe that
Traefik’s simplicity is one of the key factors that made it so popular. This
ease of use is what guides us when we design new products: Traefik Enterprise,
our distributed Ingress solution built with business in mind, Traefik Mesh, our
simpler service mesh, and Yaegi, our go interpreter.

The Position

Our documentation must reflect the high-quality standards we follow when
building our solutions. Pursuing this goal, we’re looking for a technical writer
to help us create the best user experience for both beginners discovering our
products and experts looking for advanced configuration options.

Your Mission:

 * Design and write documentation for our products
 * Work with the engineering team to make the products easier to use and to
   ensure usability stays at the heart of the design
 * Select appropriate medium for message or audience
 * Standardize content across platforms and media
 * Leverage users’ feedback to improve the documentation
 * Write and review technical articles, blog posts, and talks

What you’ll bring:

 * You have proven, successful experience in writing technical documentation for
   popular software
 * A passion for teaching and explaining high-level and technical concepts

This position calls for the following qualities:

 * A powerful team spirit: we believe that the quality of our team is the number
   one asset of the Company
 * Extreme focus on meeting goals: we are fast-growing, but this is just the
   beginning; we are an industry leader that strives for perfect execution
 * A creative mind who loves to share: while accomplishing goals requires focus,
   we do not work in silos; innovating and sharing matter to us
 * Anything from serious interest to a definite passion for Open Source
 * Whatever your native language is, you are fluent in English 

Apply here
node.html:
Worldwide
Full Time
Engineering

Data Centers around the world are experiencing a massive evolution, driven by containers, microservices, and cloud-native architectures. At Traefik Labs, we develop advanced software solutions for modern data centers. Our first product, Traefik, is being adopted at an exceptional rate: more than 25000+ stars on Github, 1+ billion downloads on DockerHub, and in production in thousands of data centers: it has become a recognized market leader less than two years after launch. We believe that Traefik’s simplicity is one of the key factors that made it so popular. This ease of use is what guides us when we design new products: Traefik Enterprise, our distributed Ingress solution built with business in mind, Traefik Mesh, our simpler service mesh, and Yaegi, our go interpreter.

The Position

Our documentation must reflect the high-quality standards we follow when building our solutions. Pursuing this goal, we’re looking for a technical writer to help us create the best user experience for both beginners discovering our products and experts looking for advanced configuration options.

Your Mission:

  • Design and write documentation for our products
  • Work with the engineering team to make the products easier to use and to ensure usability stays at the heart of the design
  • Select appropriate medium for message or audience
  • Standardize content across platforms and media
  • Leverage users’ feedback to improve the documentation
  • Write and review technical articles, blog posts, and talks

What you’ll bring:

  • You have proven, successful experience in writing technical documentation for popular software
  • A passion for teaching and explaining high-level and technical concepts

This position calls for the following qualities:

  • A powerful team spirit: we believe that the quality of our team is the number one asset of the Company
  • Extreme focus on meeting goals: we are fast-growing, but this is just the beginning; we are an industry leader that strives for perfect execution
  • A creative mind who loves to share: while accomplishing goals requires focus, we do not work in silos; innovating and sharing matter to us
  • Anything from serious interest to a definite passion for Open Source
  • Whatever your native language is, you are fluent in English

Apply here

node.title: Backend Developers
node.excerpt: We are looking for backend developers to help our team improve Containous products. Traefik Labs is a VC backed company that develops simple and future-proof cloud-native networking solutions for modern IT environments.
node.custom_excerpt: We are looking for backend developers to help our team improve Containous products. Traefik Labs is a VC backed company that develops simple and future-proof cloud-native networking solutions for modern IT environments.
node.plaintext:
Worldwide Full Time Engineering We are looking for backend developers to help
our team improve Traefik Labs products.

Your Mission:

 * You will develop Traefik, our flagship product
 * You will work closely with Docker/Swarm, Kubernetes, Mesos, Rancher, …
 * You will be part of a super-active open source project
 * You will provide support to our user base
 * You will participate in Conferences & Meet-Ups
   

What you’ll bring:

 * You love technical challenges!
 * You have proven and successful experience in a project that involved a
   microservices architecture
 * Open-Source technology belongs to your culture
 * Code quality matters to you
 * You work as a team, not as an individual

This position calls for the following qualities:

 * A very strong team spirit: we believe that the quality of our team is the
   number one asset of the Company
 * Extreme focus on meeting goals: we are fast growing, but this is just the
   beginning; we are an industry leader that strives for perfect execution
 * A creative mind who loves to share: while accomplishing goals requires focus,
   we do not work in silos; innovating and sharing matter to us
 * Anything from a serious interest to a definite passion for Open Source
 * Whatever your native language is, you have solid skills in English
 * While we practice remote working, the team regularly meets in real life; the
   ambition is international – as is our users base – and the missions require
   various level of international traveling

Apply here

node.title: Product Marketing Manager
node.excerpt: Traefik Labs is a VC backed company that develops simple and future-proof cloud-native networking solutions for modern IT environments. We believe that simpler is better, that Open Source is superior, and community drives innovation!
node.custom_excerpt: Traefik Labs is a VC backed company that develops simple and future-proof cloud-native networking solutions for modern IT environments. We believe that simpler is better, that Open Source is superior, and community drives innovation!
node.meta_description: Containous is now building the Marketing and Sales team that will drive it to the next level, with solid business ambitions in Europe and the USA.
node.plaintext:
North America Full Time Marketing Data Centers around the world are
experiencing a massive revolution, driven by containers, microservices and cloud
native architectures. Traefik Labs is a VC backed company that develops simple
and future-proof cloud-native networking solutions for modern IT environments.
The company’s popular open source projects include Traefik, the cloud-native
edge router with more than 1.4 billion downloads and used by the world’s largest
web companies. Traefik Labs’ mission is to simplify cloud-native adoption for
all enterprises.

We believe that simpler is better, that Open Source is superior, and community
drives innovation!

Having largely proven product-market fit, Traefik Labs is now building the
Marketing and Sales team that will drive it to the next level, with solid
business ambitions in Europe and the USA. If you love the energy of fast growing
tech startups and feel at home in the data center infrastructures space, Traefik
Labs may be your next challenge!

The position

As a Product Marketing Manager you will be responsible for the narrative of
Traefik Labs’ open source and commercial products by creating clear and
compelling positioning and messaging, and educating and evangelizing the market.
You'll work closely with marketing and sales teams by equipping them with sales
tools and marketing material to position the product, business benefits, and
competitive differentiation while working with cross-functional teams to launch
new products to market.

Responsibilities

 * Develop Traefik Labs product positioning, value proposition and messaging
   that differentiates our products from other competitive products in the
   market
 * Create key product collateral assets that help explain our products,
   solutions and services offerings (technical presentations, white papers, case
   studies, presentations, blogs, videos)
 * Gather competitive intelligence about other commercial and open-source
   products and drive competitive analysis and positioning
 * Communicate the vision and value of new products to the sales team and
   develop sales tools that facilitate the selling process
 * Support the development of marketing communications across different channels
 * Work closely with industry analysts to participate in and influence their
   reporting on the industry and their view of Traefik Labs
 * Produce compelling external-facing content, including thought leadership
   content, customer stories, webinars, data sheets, solution guides
 * Drive compelling product launches and marketing campaigns
 * Work with ecosystem partners to create joint value proposition documents and
   partner collaterals
 * Participate in technical aspects of go-to-market (GTM) engagements like
   roadshows, workshops, webinars, solutions demos, and industry and partner
   events
 * Synthesize customer feedback to discover emergent needs and trends that lead
   to innovative solutions.
 * Connecting with customers and users of our solutions to define customer
   testimonials and case studies

What you’ll bring

 * Successful experience with technical software products, either as product
   marketer, content marketer or business developer
 * You’re innately passionate about open source technologies and their
   communities
 * Good understanding of data center infrastructure and related businesses
 * Excellent people and project management skills to interact and organize
   teamwork across functional teams and third parties.
 * Standing-out written communication and presentation skills
 * Capability and experience in engaging with prospects, clients, media,
   influencers and partners at all levels, including DevOps and C-levels

This position calls for the following qualities

 * A very strong team spirit: we believe that the quality of our team is the
   number one asset of the Company
 * Extreme focus on meeting goals: we are fast growing, but this is just the
   beginning; we are an industry leader that strives for perfect execution
 * A creative mind who loves to share: while accomplishing goals requires focus,
   we do not work in silos; innovating and sharing matter to us
 * Anything from a serious interest to a definite passion for Open Source
 * Whatever your native language is, you have solid skills in English (French is
   a plus)
 * While we practice remote working, the team regularly meets in real life; the
   ambition is international – as is our users base – and the missions require
   various level of international travelling

The Location

This position is based in San Francisco, California, though we’d love to speak
with any qualified U.S. based candidates.

Apply here
node.html:
North America
Full Time
Marketing

Data Centers around the world are experiencing a massive revolution, driven by containers, microservices and cloud native architectures. Traefik Labs is a VC backed company that develops simple and future-proof cloud-native networking solutions for modern IT environments. The company’s popular open source projects include Traefik, the cloud-native edge router with more than 1.4 billion downloads and used by the world’s largest web companies. Traefik Labs’ mission is to simplify cloud-native adoption for all enterprises.

We believe that simpler is better, that Open Source is superior, and community drives innovation!

Having largely proven product-market fit, Traefik Labs is now building the Marketing and Sales team that will drive it to the next level, with solid business ambitions in Europe and the USA. If you love the energy of fast growing tech startups and feel at home in the data center infrastructures space, Traefik Labs may be your next challenge!

The position

As a Product Marketing Manager you will be responsible for the narrative of Traefik Labs’ open source and commercial products by creating clear and compelling positioning and messaging, and educating and evangelizing the market. You'll work closely with marketing and sales teams by equipping them with sales tools and marketing material to position the product, business benefits, and competitive differentiation while working with cross-functional teams to launch new products to market.

Responsibilities

  • Develop Traefik Labs product positioning, value proposition and messaging that differentiates our products from other competitive products in the market
  • Create key product collateral assets that help explain our products, solutions and services offerings (technical presentations, white papers, case studies, presentations, blogs, videos)
  • Gather competitive intelligence about other commercial and open-source products and drive competitive analysis and positioning
  • Communicate the vision and value of new products to the sales team and develop sales tools that facilitate the selling process
  • Support the development of marketing communications across different channels
  • Work closely with industry analysts to participate in and influence their reporting on the industry and their view of Traefik Labs
  • Produce compelling external-facing content, including thought leadership content, customer stories, webinars, data sheets, solution guides
  • Drive compelling product launches and marketing campaigns
  • Work with ecosystem partners to create joint value proposition documents and partner collaterals
  • Participate in technical aspects of go-to-market (GTM) engagements like roadshows, workshops, webinars, solutions demos, and industry and partner events
  • Synthesize customer feedback to discover emergent needs and trends that lead to innovative solutions.
  • Connecting with customers and users of our solutions to define customer testimonials and case studies

What you’ll bring

  • Successful experience with technical software products, either as product marketer, content marketer or business developer
  • You’re innately passionate about open source technologies and their communities
  • Good understanding of data center infrastructure and related businesses
  • Excellent people and project management skills to interact and organize teamwork across functional teams and third parties.
  • Standing-out written communication and presentation skills
  • Capability and experience in engaging with prospects, clients, media, influencers and partners at all levels, including DevOps and C-levels

This position calls for the following qualities

  • A very strong team spirit: we believe that the quality of our team is the number one asset of the Company
  • Extreme focus on meeting goals: we are fast growing, but this is just the beginning; we are an industry leader that strives for perfect execution
  • A creative mind who loves to share: while accomplishing goals requires focus, we do not work in silos; innovating and sharing matter to us
  • Anything from a serious interest to a definite passion for Open Source
  • Whatever your native language is, you have solid skills in English (French is a plus)
  • While we practice remote working, the team regularly meets in real life; the ambition is international – as is our users base – and the missions require various level of international travelling

The Location

This position is based in San Francisco, California, though we’d love to speak with any qualified U.S. based candidates.

Apply here

San Francisco Full Time Marketing Traefik Labs is a VC backed company that
develops simple and future-proof cloud-native networking solutions for modern IT
environments. The company’s popular open source projects include Traefik, the
cloud-native edge router with more than 1.4 billion downloads and used by the
world’s largest web companies. Traefik Labs’ mission is to simplify cloud-native
adoption for all enterprises.

We believe that simpler is better, that Open Source is superior, and community
drives innovation!

Having largely proven product-market fit, Traefik Labs is now building the
Marketing and Sales team that will drive it to the next level, with solid
business ambitions in Europe and the USA. If you love the energy of fast growing
tech startups and feel at home in the data center infrastructures space, Traefik
Labs may be your next challenge!


The Position 

As a Digital Marketing Manager, you will be responsible for the strategic
planning, execution and management of digital marketing campaigns to drive
qualified lead generation and increase brand awareness. This position will
collaborate closely with members of the marketing team, reporting to the VP of
Marketing.


Requirements

 * 4+ years of experience in demand generation, digital marketing, content
   marketing, advertising
 * 4+ years of experience in B2B (tech and open source startups is a plus)
 * You have a passion for writing and communicating
 * Demonstrable experience leading and managing online digital campaigns
 * Up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in online marketing and
   measurement
 * Managing paid campaigns at a significant scale
 * Ability to multitask in a fast-paced startup environment, organized with
   excellent project management skills
 * Proficient with Hubspot, Google Docs/Drive, AdWords, Google Analytics
   

Responsibilities

 * Research, identify, test, and implement marketing strategies and digital
   campaigns
 * Create and run email marketing campaigns for top-of-funnel lead generation
   initiatives
 * Content Management and Website Optimization
 * Define lead nurturing programs that drive engagement and conversion across
   multiple buyer personas
 * Own and operate our HubSpot marketing automation platform
 * Manage lead flow process, building and optimizing landing pages and email
   automation workflows
 * Develop A/B test campaigns to optimize messaging for improved click rates
 * Track and measure campaign metrics
 * Define content for blog, media platforms and email marketing
 * Develop marketing assets for paid campaigns, landing pages, etc.
 * SEO research, expansion, optimization, analysis, and reporting
 * Monitor web analytics dashboards, and identify key opportunities to ensure
   our online marketing efforts have the highest possible ROI
 * Weekly and monthly report generation
   

The Location

This position is based in San Francisco, California, though we’d love to speak
with any qualified U.S. based candidates.

Apply here

node.title: Developer Advocate
node.excerpt: As Traefik Labs Developer Advocate you will engage with our user and contributor community to help drive its growth. In this highly technical role, you will be an ecosystem influencer and champion of users’ needs.
node.custom_excerpt: As Traefik Labs Developer Advocate you will engage with our user and contributor community to help drive its growth. In this highly technical role, you will be an ecosystem influencer and champion of users’ needs.
node.plaintext:
Europe Full Time Engineering Traefik Labs is a VC backed company that develops
simple and future-proof cloud-native networking solutions for modern IT
environments. The company’s popular open source projects include Traefik, the
cloud-native edge router with more than 1.4 billion downloads and used by the
world’s largest web companies. Traefik Labs’ mission is to simplify cloud-native
adoption for all enterprises.

We believe that simpler is better, that Open Source is superior, and community
drives innovation!


The Position

As Traefik Labs Developer Advocate you will engage with our user and contributor
community to help drive its growth. In this highly technical role, you will be
an ecosystem influencer and champion of users’ needs. You will work to build
relationships and deeply understand and improve people’s adoption journeys by
driving activities ranging from inspiring users with the latest technology
advancements and best practices to identifying and removing the friction points
getting in their way.


Requirements

 * Accomplished public speaker willing to speak at conferences, Meetups, and
   other relevant engagements.
 * Technical writer with a track record of editorial and educational content
 * Referenceable social media persona.
 * Autonomous, yet highly collaborative, comfortable in a remote work culture
   using the tools associated with such a culture.
 * Open source software advocate with contributions on GitHub.
 * Comfortable coding and hacking on Docker and Kubernetes in an enterprise
   environment.
 * Experience with Rancher, Mesos, and other technologies that Traefik
   integrates with.
   

Responsibilities

 * Blogging, hacking, coding, demonstrating, documenting, educating, speaking,
   advocating
 * Connect with user group members, online and in person, to build personal
   relationships and understand their needs, usage, journeys, and barriers to
   adoption
 * Produce high quality technical “how-to” content (blogs, webinars, talks)
   addressing common user needs, latest technology advances, and emerging best
   practices
 * Present at meetups, webinars, conferences, and other ecosystem events
 * Provide structured feedback to Product Management to guide product evolution
 * Write code where required to support how-to content or presentations
 * Build and nurture relationships with influencers and open source leaders
 * Support our user group through regular office hours and community channels &
   forum
 * Tweet, create blog posts and other social media to your ideas and grow your
   ecosystem influence
 * Monitor user group growth and health, tracking metrics and running regular
   user group surveys
 * Seek out an understanding of the friction points getting in users’ way and
   launch & own programs to remove them
 * Produce case studies, webinars, and podcasts featuring real users
 * Travel regularly in Europe, and occasionally internationally, to attend or
   present at conferences, workshops, meetups, and other ecosystem events
   

The Location

This position is based in Europe to cover the EMEA region.

Apply here

Europe Full Time Sales Traefik Labs is a VC backed company that develops simple
and future-proof cloud-native networking solutions for modern IT environments.
The company’s popular open source projects include Traefik, the cloud-native
edge router with more than 1.4 billion downloads and used by the world’s largest
web companies. Traefik Labs’ mission is to simplify cloud-native adoption for
all enterprises.

We believe that simpler is better, that Open Source is superior, and community
drives innovation!


The Position

As a Business Development Representative you will act as the liaison between our
Marketing and Sales teams. Your role includes reaching out to Marketing
Qualified Leads to validate them while securing a follow up call with the Sales
individuals.

Requirements

 * Proven work experience as a Business Development Representative
 * Hands-on experience with multiple sales techniques (including cold calls)
 * Experience with CRM software (e.g. HubSpot)
 * Understanding of sales performance metrics
 * Excellent communication skills
 * Ability to deliver engaging presentations
 * BSc degree in Marketing, Business Administration or relevant field
   

Responsibilities

 * Qualify leads from marketing campaigns
 * Contact potential clients through cold calls and emails
 * Present our company to potential clients
 * Identify client needs and suggest appropriate products/services
 * Set up meetings or calls between (prospective) clients and Sales individuals
 * Report to the on activity
 * Provide feedback on Lead sources and Marketing program scoring
   

The Location

This position is based in Europe to cover the EMEA region.

Apply here

Traefik Labs is a VC backed company that develops simple and future-proof cloud-native networking solutions for modern IT environments. The company’s popular open source projects include Traefik, the cloud-native edge router with more than 1.4 billion downloads and used by the world’s largest web companies. Traefik Labs’ mission is to simplify cloud-native adoption for all enterprises.

We believe that simpler is better, that Open Source is superior, and community drives innovation!

The Position

As a Business Development Representative you will act as the liaison between our Marketing and Sales teams. Your role includes reaching out to Marketing Qualified Leads to validate them while securing a follow up call with the Sales individuals.

Requirements

  • Proven work experience as a Business Development Representative
  • Hands-on experience with multiple sales techniques (including cold calls)
  • Experience with CRM software (e.g. HubSpot)
  • Understanding of sales performance metrics
  • Excellent communication skills
  • Ability to deliver engaging presentations
  • BSc degree in Marketing, Business Administration or relevant field

Responsibilities

  • Qualify leads from marketing campaigns
  • Contact potential clients through cold calls and emails
  • Present our company to potential clients
  • Identify client needs and suggest appropriate products/services
  • Set up meetings or calls between (prospective) clients and Sales individuals
  • Report to the on activity
  • Provide feedback on Lead sources and Marketing program scoring

The Location:

Positions open in the East Coast (USA).

Apply here

prospects and closing sales. 


Requirements

 * Proven sales (inside and/or field) experience
 * Track record of over-achieving quota
 * Strong phone presence and experience dialing dozens of calls per day
 * Proficient with corporate productivity and web presentation tools
 * Experience working with Salesforce.com or similar CRM
 * Excellent verbal and written communications skills
 * Strong listening and presentation skills
 * Ability to multi-task, prioritize, and manage time effectively
 * BA/BS degree or equivalent
   

Responsibilities

 * Source new sales opportunities through inbound lead follow-up and outbound
   cold calls and emails as needed
 * Understand customer needs and requirements
 * Close sales and achieve quarterly quotas
 * Research accounts, identify key players and generate interest
 * Maintain and expand your database of prospects within your assigned territory
   [https://resources.workable.com/territory-manager-job-description]
 * Team with channel partners to build pipeline and close deals
 * Perform effective online demos to prospects
   

The Location

This position is based in Europe.

Apply here

node.title: Solutions Architect
node.excerpt: As Traefik Labs Solutions Architect you will work closely with the Sales team and put together customized presentations and product demonstrations supporting the sales strategy while illustrating our products’ ability to address clients unique business needs.
node.custom_excerpt: As Traefik Labs Solutions Architect you will work closely with the Sales team and put together customized presentations and product demonstrations supporting the sales strategy while illustrating our products’ ability to address clients unique business needs.
node.plaintext:
Europe Full Time Engineering Traefik Labs is a VC backed company that develops
simple and future-proof cloud-native networking solutions for modern IT
environments. The company’s popular open source projects include Traefik, the
cloud-native edge router with more than 1.4 billion downloads and used by the
world’s largest web companies. Traefik Labs’ mission is to simplify cloud-native
adoption for all enterprises.

We believe that simpler is better, that Open Source is superior, and community
drives innovation!


The Position

As Traefik Labs Solutions Architect you will work closely with the Sales team
and put together customized presentations and product demonstrations supporting
the sales strategy while illustrating our products’ ability to address clients
unique business needs.

The activities you may be involved with include running workshops, conducting
client interviews, secondary research, input from the Account Team, working with
specialists, product managers, and other stakeholders.


Requirements

 * Excellent listener, able to solve complex problems
 * Big picture thinker able to visualize and illustrate technical solutions
 * Proven technical skills with business acumen
 * Excellent communications and interpersonal skills
 * Strong presentation, executive client management and business development
   skills
 * Understanding of modern application environment (containers, containers
   orchestrator, microservices)
 * Understanding of new development methodology (Scrum, Devops)
 * Understanding of modern IT production data center and software defined
   datacenter strategy
 * Strong interpersonal skills, with proven ability to effectively engage with
   technical and non-technical audience
 * Autonomous, yet highly collaborative, comfortable in a remote work culture
   using the tools associated with such a culture.
 * Comfortable coding and hacking on Docker and Kubernetes in an enterprise
   environment.
 * Experience with technologies that Traefik integrates with
 * Ability and willingness to travel as necessary
   

Responsibilities

 * Participate in the pre-sales process to understand customer business,
   technical objectives, and product requirements
 * Gather a clear and agreed upon client vision
 * Design solutions to meet the business/technical objectives
 * Develop vision strategy and roadmaps deliverables to meet technical solutions
 * Effectively communicate solutions architecture to the customer, third parties
   and the project teams
 * Seek out an understanding of the friction points getting in the way of the
   technical validation
 * Prepare arguments to handle objections and support technical validation in
   the context of the prospect
 * Participate in account relationship and issue management activities
 * Establish trustworthy relationships with customers and prospects technical
   users
 * Maintain proficiency in Containous solutions offerings, value propositions,
   and representative case studies
 * Obtain continuous feedback from the field, including customers, bringing IP
   back to corporate teams and making recommendations on future offerings
 * Provide feedback to Product Management based on customer feedback
 * Produce high quality best practices content (KB tech notes) addressing common
   user needs and latest technology advances
 * Support the production of case studies, webinars, and podcasts featuring real
   users
 * Travel regularly within the US, and occasionally internationally, to attend
   or present at conferences, workshops, meetups, and other ecosystem events
   

The Location

This position is based in Europe to cover the EMEA region.

Apply here

node.plaintext:
Worldwide Full Time Marketing Data Centers around the world are experiencing a
massive evolution, driven by containers, microservices and cloud native
architectures. Traefik Labs is a VC backed company that develops simple and
future-proof cloud-native networking solutions for modern IT environments. The
company’s popular open source projects include Traefik, the cloud-native edge
router with more than 1.4 billion downloads and used by the world’s largest web
companies. Traefik Labs’ mission is to simplify cloud-native adoption for all
enterprises.

We believe that simpler is better, that Open Source is superior, and community
drives innovation!

Having largely proven product-market fit, Traefik Labs is now building the
Marketing and Sales team that will drive it to the next level, with solid
business ambitions in Europe and the USA. If you love the energy of fast growing
tech startups and feel at home in the data center infrastructures space, Traefik
may be your next challenge!

Your Mission:

 * Make our customers successful with our products
 * You are the voice of our customers: You understand their goals and their
   needs, how our products impact their processes, you guide them on improving
   their experience with our product. You interact with them on a regular basis
   via various means and engage both reactively and proactively.
 * You provide our clients with an optimal onboarding experience, train them to
   become increasingly self-sufficient, and accompany them as their usage grows.
 * The success of your mission will transform our best clients into ambassadors;
   you will also understand their future needs and help identify and close
   upselling opportunities.
 * Your knowledge of our clients’ usage and needs will contribute to the
   definition of our product strategy. As such, you will work very closely with
   the rest of the team (CTO, Sales, Product marketing). Based on your skills
   and successes, this role may take a managerial dimension as our users base
   and team grow.

What you’ll bring:

 * Successful experience in a customer success role in a technical, B2B software
   environment
 * Nothing makes you happier than a happy customer; you are a problem solver
 * You know, understand, and appreciate the intricacies of open source software
   development
 * You are a self-motivated, proactive team player with a natural curiosity and
   passion for learning with strong interpersonal skills
 * You don’t fear high-pressure situations and your capacity to listen, your
   diplomacy, and your tact are recognized and appreciated
 * Highly process-oriented mindset with a love for telling stories with data

This position calls for the following qualities:

 * A very strong team spirit: we believe that the quality of our team is the
   number one asset of the Company
 * Extreme focus on meeting goals: we are fast growing, but this is just the
   beginning; we are an industry leader that strives for perfect execution
 * A creative mind who loves to share: while accomplishing goals requires focus,
   we do not work in silos; innovating and sharing matter to us
 * Anything from a serious interest to a definite passion for Open Source
 * Whatever your native language is, you have solid skills in English (French is
   a plus)
 * While we practice remote working, the team regularly meets in real life; the
   ambition is international – as is our users base – and the missions require
   various level of international travelling

Apply here

Worldwide
Full Time
Marketing

Data Centers around the world are experiencing a massive evolution, driven by containers, microservices and cloud native architectures. Traefik Labs is a VC backed company that develops simple and future-proof cloud-native networking solutions for modern IT environments. The company’s popular open source projects include Traefik, the cloud-native edge router with more than 1.4 billion downloads and used by the world’s largest web companies. Traefik Labs’ mission is to simplify cloud-native adoption for all enterprises.

We believe that simpler is better, that Open Source is superior, and community drives innovation!

Having largely proven product-market fit, Traefik Labs is now building the Marketing and Sales team that will drive it to the next level, with solid business ambitions in Europe and the USA. If you love the energy of fast growing tech startups and feel at home in the data center infrastructures space, Traefik may be your next challenge!

Your Mission:

  • Make our customers successful with our products
  • You are the voice of our customers: You understand their goals and their needs, how our products impact their processes, you guide them on improving their experience with our product. You interact with them on a regular basis via various means and engage both reactively and proactively.
  • You provide our clients with an optimal onboarding experience, train them to become increasingly self-sufficient, and accompany them as their usage grows.
  • The success of your mission will transform our best clients into ambassadors; you will also understand their future needs and help identify and close upselling opportunities.
  • Your knowledge of our clients’ usage and needs will contribute to the definition of our product strategy. As such, you will work very closely with the rest of the team (CTO, Sales, Product marketing). Based on your skills and successes, this role may take a managerial dimension as our users base and team grow.

What you’ll bring:

  • Successful experience in a customer success role in a technical, B2B software environment
  • Nothing makes you happier than a happy customer; you are a problem solver
  • You know, understand, and appreciate the intricacies of open source software development
  • You are a self-motivated, proactive team player with a natural curiosity and passion for learning with strong interpersonal skills
  • You don’t fear high-pressure situations and your capacity to listen, your diplomacy, and your tact are recognized and appreciated
  • Highly process-oriented mindset with a love for telling stories with data

This position calls for the following qualities:

  • A very strong team spirit: we believe that the quality of our team is the number one asset of the Company
  • Extreme focus on meeting goals: we are fast growing, but this is just the beginning; we are an industry leader that strives for perfect execution
  • A creative mind who loves to share: while accomplishing goals requires focus, we do not work in silos; innovating and sharing matter to us
  • Anything from a serious interest to a definite passion for Open Source
  • Whatever your native language is, you have solid skills in English (French is a plus)
  • While we practice remote working, the team regularly meets in real life; the ambition is international – as is our users base – and the missions require various level of international travelling

Apply here
